text: Zogota is a town in southeastern Guinea. ==Mining== It is the site of large iron ore deposits. Initial production proposed for 2012 is 2mtpa. The mine is owned by BSG Resources. The mine will be connected by a standard gauge railway across the border to a port in Liberia. ==See also== * Iron ore in Africa * Railway stations in Guinea ==References== Category:Populated places in Guinea
title: Zogota
